Cortex_PH0036pial_lh.mat
Cortex_PH0036pial_rh.mat  

Matlab files containing the following structure. 

%           Surface --    a structure containing the options, specific to
%                          each mesh. 
%
%               .WhichMesh    --  A string specifying the surface to
%                                 be loaded. 
%                                 Default = 'pial'; 
%                                 Possible values = {'pial', 'white'};
%               .WhichSubject --  A string specifying the subject code.
%               .hemisphere   --  A string specifying which hemisphere.
%                                 Default = 'rh'; 
%                                 Possible values = {'rh', 'lh'};
%               .tr           --  A matlab TriRep object, representing the surface. 
%               .SummaryInfo  --  A structure with relevant info about the
%                                 surface geometry and topology.


RegionMapping_PH0036_rh_aparc_68.mat
RegionMapping_PH0036_lh_aparc_68.mat


Matlab files containing the index vectors for the 68 parcellation, that is,
the Region Mapping when all the subcortical structures have been stripped out.

The file Hagmann2014_aparc68_Hagmann2008_aparc66.xlsx has the correspondance
between the indices used in the '68' parcellation and the indices from the old
'66' parcellation.
